title: "Combined unsupervised-supervised machine learning for phenotyping complex diseases with its application to obstructive sleep apnea"
excerpt: "Unsupervised clustering models have been widely used for multimetric phenotyping of complex and heterogeneous diseases such as diabetes and obstructive sleep apnea (OSA) to more precisely characterize the disease beyond simplistic conventional diagnosis standards."
